attributes.action: Delay parliamentary recess until the results of easing lockdown are public
attributes.additional_details: There are increasing concerns about the speed and timing of easing lockdown. The public and parliament must be able to scrutinise and have confidence in government' decisions
attributes.background: To ensure that the results of easing lockdown can be reflected in a parliamentary debate before any further easing is implemented

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332743
